title: Pixel 3a Back Camera and Bottom microphone both not working.
content:
I have tried everything I could find on this forum/the internet.
The Issues: Back camera refuses to display/take photos + videos & then crashes the app
Microphone: not usable while in phone call, speaker phone does work though.

For Back Camera Problems:
cleared cache/storage
updated/reverted app versions
reboot in safe mode
factory reset

For faulty microphone:
cleared cache/storage
reboot in safe mode
factory reset


Any help is appreciated, taking it to a service place as per google support but wanted to search the community for any other last-ditch answer

UPDATE:
Had to get repaired under warranty.
Replaced:
Back camera
Motherboard
speaker/mic/charging port piece
